search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Chatwork (chatwork.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for Chatwork's pricing page is: [https://go.chatwork.com/en/pricing/](https://go.chatwork.com/en/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Chatwork | Pricing
===============        

[![Image 6: Chatwork](https://go.chatwork.com/en/image/common/logo_hz.png)](https://go.chatwork.com/en/)
========================================================================================================

*   [Why Chatwork?](https://go.chatwork.com/en/product/)  
    
    *   [Features](https://go.chatwork.com/en/product/)
    *   [Security](https://go.chatwork.com/en/security/)
    
*   [Pricing](https://go.chatwork.com/en/pricing/)
*   [Customer](https://go.chatwork.com/en/case/)
*   [Resources](https://go.chatwork.com/en/resources/)  
    
    *   [Resources library](https://go.chatwork.com/en/resources/)
    *   [App download](https://go.chatwork.com/en/download/)
    *   [API document](https://download.chatwork.com/ChatWork_API_Documentation.pdf)
    
*   [FAQ](https://support-en.chatwork.com/hc/en-us)
*   [Sign In](https://www.chatwork.com/?login=en)

Flexible, convenient plans for teams of all sizes.
==================================================

Sign up for free
----------------

Get Started

[Download documents](https://share.hsforms.com/1s7EseWnPSSq2eBcOCCo2ow44pze)

Pricing
=======

Used by over companies\*, Chatwork is quickly becoming one of the most popular business chat platforms in the world. Choose a plan and get started today!

*   \* As of the end of

Free
====

1 User

$0USD / month

[Sign Up](https://www.chatwork.com/service/packages/chatwork/pre_register.php?plan=free&lang=en)

*   Maximum 100 users
*   Secure messaging
*   External Organization Contacts:20people/1user
*   1:1 chat External Organization Users:20people
*   Unlimited number of group chats
*   View messages : Within the last 40 days
*   1:1 video calls
*   Two-factor authentication
*   10GB storage / organization
*   Searchable message history
*   Task management
*   Free iOS, Android & Desktop apps
*   General support
*   User Management (limitations apply)
*   File Management
*   Auto connect

Business\*1
===========

1 User  
(Annual Subscription)

$7USD / month

$ 8.4 USD / month with monthly subscription

[Sign Up](https://www.chatwork.com/service/packages/chatwork/pre_register.php?plan=business&lang=en)

*   Unlimited users
*   Secure messaging
*   Unlimited External Organization Contacts
*   Unlimited 1:1 chats
*   Unlimited number of group chats
*   Unlimited number of viewable messages
*   Group video calls
*   Two-factor authentication
*   10GB storage / user
*   Searchable message history (search options available)
*   Task management
*   Free iOS, Android & Desktop apps
*   Dedicated support
*   User management
*   File management
*   Auto connect
*   Import CSV file of contacts

*   \* All prices do not include tax.
*   \* Easily upgrade plans with all your data migrated.
*   \* If the number of users and the number of licenses do not match, a fee will be charged based on the number of licenses. For more information, please click [here](https://support-en.chatwork.com/hc/en-us/articles/900001118303).
*   \* Excluding information regarding services provided by our company and group companies.

First time users and first time companies can start with a free plan.
=====================================================================

Up to 100 users for free
------------------------

Whether you are a single user, a team, or a group, you can start using our service for free.

*   Unlimited number of group chats
*   One-on-one video calls and voice calls
*   Storage 10GB / contract
*   View messages : Within the last 40 days
*   External Organization Contacts:20people/1user

![Image 7](https://go.chatwork.com/en/image/pricing/office.png)

Administrator user management
-----------------------------

Manage your users' accounts from the administration screen.

*   Add users
*   Delete users
*   View user information
*   Team functionality

![Image 8](https://go.chatwork.com/en/image/pricing/user_1.png)

We also recommend the Business Plan, which offers enhanced management features.
===============================================================================

Take full advantage of features that were limited in the free plan
------------------------------------------------------------------

Increase productivity using Chatwork features free of restrictions.

![Image 9](https://go.chatwork.com/en/image/pricing/database.png)

Storage capacity  
increases from  
10GB/contract to 10GB/user
--------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 10](https://go.chatwork.com/en/image/pricing/group.png)

All past messages  
can be viewed/saved
---------------------------------------

![Image 11](https://go.chatwork.com/en/image/pricing/camera.png)

Hold video calls with  
multiple users
--------------------------------------

The functionality is designed for organizations to help them reduce their operational workload
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You can use features that make Chatwork smoother and easier to use.

![Image 12](https://go.chatwork.com/en/image/pricing/csv.png)

User Bulk Import Functionality
------------------------------

Multiple users can be registered together from a CSV file, making it easier for administrators to add users.

![Image 13](https://go.chatwork.com/en/image/pricing/user_2.png)

Ability to configure user admin settings
----------------------------------------

This feature allows multiple people to manage users in the organization, which enables the operational load of administrative tasks to be delegated to others.

[![Image 14: Chatwork](https://go.chatwork.com/en/image/common/logo_hz_bl.png)](https://go.chatwork.com/en/)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Prices exclude tax. Additional fees may apply if the number of users and licenses do not match.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Basic free plan for individual users.
features: View messages: Within the last 40 days

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Enhanced plan for businesses with additional features.

additional_fees.fee_description: Fee charged based on the number of licenses if the number of users and licenses do not match.
